languages.text: Все больше странных звуков вплеталось в хор, доносящийся из-за двери. К хлюпанью и треску добавились стуки, затем скрежет. Хрипы. Рычание. Приборы также зафиксировали увеличение массы корабля в районе отсека с зеркалом. Наконец из-за двери зазвучали приглушенные людские голоса, умоляющие о помощи.

Yet more abnormal noises joined the ungodly symphony playing behind the compartment door. The squelching and snapping were soon joined by rattling, wheezing, and growling. Sensors also detected an increase in the ship's mass in the area near the compartment. Soon, faint human voices could be heard, begging to be saved.
languages.original_text: Все больше странных звуков вплеталось в хор, доносящийся из-за двери. К хлюпанью и треску добавились стуки, затем скрежет. Хрипы. Рычание. Приборы также зафиксировали увеличение массы корабля в районе отсека с зеркалом. Наконец из-за двери зазвучали приглушенные людские голоса, умоляющие о помощи.

traits.locale_text: More weird noises joined the ungodly symphony playing behind the compartment door. The squishing and crackling was soon joined by rattling, wheezing and growling. The sensors detect the mass in the compartment growing. Soon faint human voices joined the abnormal choir, begging to be saved.

More weird noises joined the ungodly symphony playing behind the compartment door. The squishing and crackling was soon joined by rattling, wheezing and growling. The sensors detect the mass in the compartment growing. Soon faint human voices joined the abnormal choir, begging to be saved.

Yet more abnormal noises joined the ungodly symphony playing from behind the compartment door. The squishing and crackling was soon joined by rattling, wheezing, and growling. The sensors detected a growing mass in the compartment with the mirror. Soon faint human voices began to murmur amidst the profane choir, pleading to be saved.

Yet more abnormal noises joined the ungodly symphony playing behind the compartment door. The squelching and snapping were soon joined by rattling, wheezing, and growling. Sensors also detected an increase in the ship's mass in the area near the compartment. Soon, faint human voices could be heard, begging to be saved.

Yet more abnormal noises joined the ungodly symphony playing behind the compartment door. The squelching and snapping were soon joined by rattling, wheezing, and growling. Sensors also detected an increase in the ship's mass in the area near the compartment. Soon, faint human voices could be heard, begging to be saved.

Yet more abnormal noises joined the ungodly symphony playing behind the compartment door. The squelching and snapping were soon joined by rattling, wheezing, and growling. Sensors also detected an increase in the ship's mass in the area near the compartment. Soon, faint human voices could be heard, begging to be saved.

languages.text: 然而，更多怪异的声音加入了舱门后面这场诡异的交响乐。很快，除了挤压声和断裂声之外，船舱里还发出了咯吱咯吱的声音、喘息声、咆哮声。传感器还探测到，船舱附近区域的质量正在增加。没过多久，船员们就听到船舱中传来了微弱的人声，乞求有谁来救救他们。
languages.original_text: Yet more abnormal noises joined the ungodly symphony playing behind the compartment door. The squelching and snapping were soon joined by rattling, wheezing, and growling. Sensors also detected an increase in the ship's mass in the area near the compartment. Soon, faint human voices could be heard, begging to be saved.

traits.locale_text: 然而，更多怪异的声音加入了舱门后面这场诡异的交响乐。很快，除了挤压声和断裂声之外，船舱里还发出了咯吱咯吱的声音、喘息声、咆哮声。传感器还探测到，船舱附近区域的质量正在增加。没过多久，船员们就听到船舱中传来了微弱的人声，乞求有谁来救救他们。

languages.text: Aún más ruidos inexplicables se incorporaron a la sinfonía aberrante del compartimento. A los chapoteos y los chasquidos se unieron traqueteos, jadeos y gruñidos. Los sensores detectaron también un aumento de la masa de la nave en la zona cercana al compartimento. Poco después, se oyeron voces humanas débiles, suplicando ayuda.
languages.original_text: Yet more abnormal noises joined the ungodly symphony playing behind the compartment door. The squelching and snapping were soon joined by rattling, wheezing, and growling. Sensors also detected an increase in the ship's mass in the area near the compartment. Soon, faint human voices could be heard, begging to be saved.

traits.locale_text: Aún más ruidos inexplicables se incorporaron a la sinfonía aberrante del compartimento. A los chapoteos y los chasquidos se unieron traqueteos, jadeos y gruñidos. Los sensores detectaron también un aumento de la masa de la nave en la zona cercana al compartimento. Poco después, se oyeron voces humanas débiles, suplicando ayuda.

languages.text: 区画室のドアの向こうで奏でられる邪悪なシンフォニーに合わせ、さらに異常な音が加わった。軋むような音に加え、ガタガタという音、苦しそうに喘ぐ声やうなり声が響く。また、センサーが区画室付近の船体質量が増えていることも検知。やがて、「助けてくれ」という人間の声がかすかに聞こえてきた。
languages.original_text: Yet more abnormal noises joined the ungodly symphony playing behind the compartment door. The squelching and snapping were soon joined by rattling, wheezing, and growling. Sensors also detected an increase in the ship's mass in the area near the compartment. Soon, faint human voices could be heard, begging to be saved.

traits.locale_text: 区画室のドアの向こうで奏でられる邪悪なシンフォニーに合わせ、さらに異常な音が加わった。軋むような音に加え、ガタガタという音、苦しそうに喘ぐ声やうなり声が響く。また、センサーが区画室付近の船体質量が増えていることも検知。やがて、「助けてくれ」という人間の声がかすかに聞こえてきた。

languages.text: Zu der gottlosen Symphonie, die hinter der Tür des Moduls aufgeführt wurde, kamen noch weitere abnormale Geräusche dazu. Das Schmatzen und Knacken wurde bald ergänzt um ein Rasseln, Keuchen und Knurren. Sensoren entdeckten außerdem einen Anstieg der Masse des Schiffs in dem Gebiet um das Modul herum. Bald konnten schwache menschliche Stimmen vernommen werden, die darum bettelten, gerettet zu werden.
languages.original_text: Yet more abnormal noises joined the ungodly symphony playing behind the compartment door. The squelching and snapping were soon joined by rattling, wheezing, and growling. Sensors also detected an increase in the ship's mass in the area near the compartment. Soon, faint human voices could be heard, begging to be saved.

traits.locale_text: Zu der gottlosen Symphonie, die hinter der Tür des Moduls aufgeführt wurde, kamen noch weitere abnormale Geräusche dazu. Das Schmatzen und Knacken wurde bald ergänzt um ein Rasseln, Keuchen und Knurren. Sensoren entdeckten außerdem einen Anstieg der Masse des Schiffs in dem Gebiet um das Modul herum. Bald konnten schwache menschliche Stimmen vernommen werden, die darum bettelten, gerettet zu werden.

languages.text: Mais d'autres sons anormaux ont rejoint cette symphonie impie qui se joue derrière la porte du compartiment. Les craquements et les bruits gluants sont rapidement accompagnés de cliquetis, sifflements et autres grognements. Les capteurs ont également détecté une hausse de la masse du vaisseau dans la zone près du compartiment. Assez vite, des voix humaines étouffées se font entendre, suppliant d'être secourues.
languages.original_text: Yet more abnormal noises joined the ungodly symphony playing behind the compartment door. The squelching and snapping were soon joined by rattling, wheezing, and growling. Sensors also detected an increase in the ship's mass in the area near the compartment. Soon, faint human voices could be heard, begging to be saved.

traits.locale_text: Mais d'autres sons anormaux ont rejoint cette symphonie impie qui se joue derrière la porte du compartiment. Les craquements et les bruits gluants sont rapidement accompagnés de cliquetis, sifflements et autres grognements. Les capteurs ont également détecté une hausse de la masse du vaisseau dans la zone près du compartiment. Assez vite, des voix humaines étouffées se font entendre, suppliant d'être secourues.

languages.text: Kompartıman kapısının ardında çalmakta olan korkunç senfoniye başka anormal sesler de katılıyor. Gıcırtı ve çatırtılara çok geçmeden tıkırtı, hırıltı ve homurtular karışıyor. Sensörler, ayrıca kompartımanın olduğu bölgede gemi kütlesinde bir artış tespit ediyor. Kısa süre sonra da kurtarılmak için yalvaran, kısık insan sesleri duyuluyor.
languages.original_text: Yet more abnormal noises joined the ungodly symphony playing behind the compartment door. The squelching and snapping were soon joined by rattling, wheezing, and growling. Sensors also detected an increase in the ship's mass in the area near the compartment. Soon, faint human voices could be heard, begging to be saved.
